settings.text: 100% of your money back when you return your PitcheroGPS Player Bundle or Team Bundle within 30 days of delivery!

At PitcheroGPS, our primary aim is to ensure our customers experience improvements in their speed and fitness. We want you to be confident that the PitcheroGPS Bundle you invest in, optimises your or your team's performance.

That’s why if for any reason, you’re not 100% satisfied with your PitcheroGPS Player or Team Bundle, we will refund the entire purchase if you contact us within 30 days of receiving your order.

Simply contact our customer support team to begin the returns process. Once we receive your returned order, we will process a full refund of your original purchase*. It will take between 5-10 working days for your money to return to your account once we have processed your refund.

You can contact the PitcheroGPS customer support team by email support@pitcherogps.com.

* If the returns package is incomplete or the PitcheroGPS Vest or Base Layer is returned damaged, it may result in a deduction from the refund amount.
